title: Stylish Meliá Escape on the Coast of Montenegro with Daily Dining
description:
Treat yourself to a stay at Meliá Budva Petrovac, a five-star hotel on the coast of Montenegro, where you can relax and unwind in style. Tucked away on the Adriatic Coast, Montenegro is a stunning country, home to beautiful beaches, medieval architecture and rich culture - perfect for a European escape with a difference. Only a short stroll from the beach, Meliá Budva Petrovac is the ideal base.

Enjoy daily breakfast, nightly Mediterranean buffet dinner and a welcome bottle of wine and snacks on arrival.
